data.comment: The first-half is just kicking off.
Botafogo's Warley gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 1, Ball goes out of play for a Corinthians goal kick.
Throw-in for Botafogo at Estadio Olimpico Nilton Santos.
Botafogo awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 4, Heber Roberto Lopes awards Corinthians a goal kick.
Goal kick for Botafogo at Estadio Olimpico Nilton Santos.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Rio de Janeiro.
In the minute 6, Cicero (Botafogo) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
Corinthians have a goal kick.
Can Botafogo get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Corinthians's half?
In the minute 9, Free kick for Botafogo in their own half.
Heber Roberto Lopes awards the away team a throw-in.
Heber Roberto Lopes signals a free kick to Botafogo in their own half.
In the minute 11, Throw-in for Corinthians in their own half.
Corinthians awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Caio Alexandre is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
In the minute 12, Caio Alexandre has recovered and rejoins the match in Rio de Janeiro.
Heber Roberto Lopes signals a free kick to Botafogo in their own half.
Throw-in Botafogo.
In the minute 16, Throw-in for Botafogo in the half of Corinthians.
Free kick for Botafogo in their own half.
Ball safe as Corinthians is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 18, Fagner of Corinthians smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Gustavo Da Silva for Corinthians drives towards goal at Estadio Olimpico Nilton Santos. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Botafogo's Pedro Raul breaks free at Estadio Olimpico Nilton Santos. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 19, It's a goal kick for the away team in Rio de Janeiro.
Corinthians are pushing forward but Jo's finish is wide of the goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Botafogo goal kick.
In the minute 21, Heber Roberto Lopes signals a Botafogo throw-in in Corinthians's half.
Free kick Botafogo.
Corinthians awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 23, Goal kick for Botafogo at Estadio Olimpico Nilton Santos.
Botafogo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Botafogo have been awarded a corner by Heber Roberto Lopes.
In the minute 25, Botafogo attack but Marcelo Benevenuto's header doesn't find the target.
Corinthians have a goal kick.
Heber Roberto Lopes awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 27, Heber Roberto Lopes signals a free kick to Corinthians in their own half.
Free kick for Botafogo in their own half.
Throw-in Botafogo.
In the minute 29, Free kick for Botafogo in their own half.
Corinthians awarded a free kick in their own half.
Juan Cazares of Corinthians gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 31, Heber Roberto Lopes awards Botafogo a goal kick.
Throw-in for Botafogo at Estadio Olimpico Nilton Santos.
Throw-in for Corinthians in their own half.
In the minute 34, Goal! A Juan Cazares header gives Corinthians a 0-1 lead in Rio de Janeiro.
That's a fine assist from Gustavo Da Silva.
Corinthians awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 36, Heber Roberto Lopes signals a free kick to Botafogo in their own half.
Botafogo drive forward but Pedro Raul is judged offside.
Corinthians's Fagner gets in a shot on goal at Estadio Olimpico Nilton Santos. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 39, Corner awarded to Corinthians.
Corner awarded to Corinthians.
Corinthians have been awarded a corner by Heber Roberto Lopes.
In the minute 41, It's a goal kick for the home team in Rio de Janeiro.
Heber Roberto Lopes signals a free kick to Corinthians.
Ball safe as Botafogo is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 43, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Botafogo in their own half.
Corinthians to take a throw-in in Botafogo territory.
In the minute 45, Heber Roberto Lopes awards the away team a throw-in.
2 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
Free kick for Corinthians in their own half.
In the minute 45, The first-half is over.
The second-half is underway in Rio de Janeiro.
Heber Roberto Lopes signals a free kick to Corinthians in their own half.
Matheus Barcelos da Silva is on a sub for Warley for Botafogo.
In the minute 46, Ramon Diaz is making the team's second substitution at Estadio Olimpico Nilton Santos with Salomon Kalou replacing Victor Luis.
Corinthians awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 47, In Rio de Janeiro Corinthians drive forward through Ramiro. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Pedro Raul gets his shot on target but fails to score for Botafogo.
Free kick for Corinthians in the half of Botafogo.
In the minute 49, Corinthians have been awarded a corner by Heber Roberto Lopes.
Corinthians's Juan Cazares misses with an attempt on goal.
Botafogo have a goal kick.
In the minute 51, In Rio de Janeiro a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Free kick for Botafogo in their own half.
Throw-in Botafogo.
In the minute 53, In Rio de Janeiro Corinthians attack through Romulo Otero. The finish is off target, however.
Goal kick for Botafogo at Estadio Olimpico Nilton Santos.
Corner awarded to Botafogo.
In the minute 55, In Rio de Janeiro a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Throw-in for Corinthians at Estadio Olimpico Nilton Santos.
Botafogo have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 56, Heber Roberto Lopes signals a free kick to Corinthians in their own half.
Throw-in for Corinthians in the half of Botafogo.
Throw-in high up the field for Corinthians in Rio de Janeiro.
In the minute 59, Botafogo awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Ball safe as Botafogo is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Alexander Lecaros is replacing Jose Welison for Botafogo at Estadio Olimpico Nilton Santos.
In the minute 60, Botafogo drives forward and Alexander Lecaros gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Botafogo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Heber Roberto Lopes signals a throw-in for Botafogo, close to Corinthians's area.
In the minute 63, Botafogo are coming forward and Matheus Barcelos da Silva gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Corinthians goal kick.
Free kick for Corinthians in their own half.
In the minute 64, Free kick Botafogo.
Corinthians to take a throw-in in Botafogo territory.
Free kick for Corinthians in the half of Botafogo.
In the minute 66, Corinthians are in shooting range from this free kick.
In Rio de Janeiro, Juan Cazares of Corinthians is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Corinthians have been awarded a corner by Heber Roberto Lopes.
In the minute 69, Heber Roberto Lopes awards Botafogo a goal kick.
Can Botafogo get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Corinthians's half?
Can Botafogo capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Corinthians's half?
In the minute 70, The away team replace Romulo Otero with Mateus Vital.
Vagner Mancini (Corinthians) is making a second substitution, with Leo Natel replacing Gustavo Da Silva.
Eber Bessa is replacing Cicero for the home team.
In the minute 72, In Rio de Janeiro Corinthians's Mateus Vital is caught offside.
Throw-in Botafogo.
Gabriel hits the post! Very nearly a goal there in Rio de Janeiro for Corinthians.
In the minute 74, Corinthians's Jo has run offside.
Heber Roberto Lopes blows against Botafogo's Kanu for offside.
In the minute 75, Heber Roberto Lopes signals a free kick to Corinthians.
Fagner (Corinthians) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Eber Bessa (Botafogo) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 76, Heber Roberto Lopes signals a free kick to Botafogo.
Ramiro is booked for the away team and will be suspended from the next match.
Corinthians awarded a free kick in their own half.
Heber Roberto Lopes signals a free kick to Botafogo in their own half.
In the minute 78, Jo (Corinthians) gets in a header on goal but the attempt is cleared.
Throw-in for Corinthians close to the penalty box.
Corinthians make their third substitution with Lucas Piton Crivellaro replacing Jo.
In the minute 80, Corner awarded to Corinthians.
Heber Roberto Lopes awards Botafogo a goal kick.
In the minute 80, Free kick for Botafogo in the half of Corinthians.
Corinthians make their fourth substitution with Joao Vitor Xavier de Almeida replacing Ramiro.
Goal kick for Corinthians at Estadio Olimpico Nilton Santos.
In the minute 81, Ball safe as Corinthians is awarded a throw-in in their half.
The home team replace Rafael Forster with Rhuan.
Heber Roberto Lopes signals a Corinthians throw-in in Botafogo's half.
Botafogo needs to be cautious. Corinthians have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 83, Ball goes out of play for a Botafogo goal kick.
Heber Roberto Lopes signals a free kick to Corinthians in their own half.
Corinthians pushes forward through Mateus Vital, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 84, Botafogo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Botafogo are coming forward and Rhuan gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Corinthians have a goal kick.
Free kick for Corinthians in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Rio de Janeiro.
In the minute 86, Marllon is on a sub for Juan Cazares for Corinthians.
In the minute 87, Free kick for Botafogo in their own half.
Important block from the Corinthians defence as Pedro Raul fires in a strike for Botafogo.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 89, Corinthians push forward at Estadio Olimpico Nilton Santos and Mateus Vital gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Botafogo defence.
Corner awarded to Corinthians.
Botafogo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Heber Roberto Lopes signals a free kick to Corinthians in their own half.
Heber Roberto Lopes awards Botafogo a goal kick.
The 2nd half is prolonged by 5 minutes of added time.
Eber Bessa of Botafogo gets in a strike, but is off target.
Ball goes out of play for a Corinthians goal kick.
Throw-in for Corinthians in their own half.
Heber Roberto Lopes signals a free kick to Corinthians in their own half.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 0-2.
Great finish from Mateus Vital to give Corinthians a 0-2 lead.
